item.title: CASML 2025 - LLM Development Workshop at IISc Bangalore
item.description:
IndiaAI Official Pre-Summit Event for AI Impact Summit 2026

Day 2 hands-on technical workshop in collaboration with NVIDIA, covering:

  • End-to-end LLM development workflows
  • Optimizing and deploying models on NVIDIA GPUs
  • GPU-based training and efficient model serving
  • Architecture insights & mixed-precision training techniques

Co-presented with Dr. Manish Modani and team from NVIDIA NVAITC.

Built for AI developers, researchers, and engineers eager to scale their models with cutting-edge compute infrastructure.
